DataElement.preferredName: Comparative Marker Selection Parameter Set P-Value Smoothing java.lang.Boolean
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An algorithm for assigning significance values to genes being tested for their ability to discriminate between microarray samples.:Any factor that defines a system and determines (or limits) its performance.:A group of things of the same kind that belong together and are so used._A measure of the probability that a result happened by chance. The lower the p-value, the more likely it is that the result was caused by phenomenon of interest.:The modification of a set of data to make it smooth and nearly continuous and remove or diminish outlying points._Generic value domain for a primitive java datatype that is a Boolean value (true or false).

Concepts.definition: An algorithm for assigning significance values to genes being tested for their ability to discriminate between microarray samples.
Any factor that defines a system and determines (or limits) its performance.
A group of things of the same kind that belong together and are so used.

Property.preferredDefinition: A measure of the probability that a result happened by chance. The lower the p-value, the more likely it is that the result was caused by phenomenon of interest.:The modification of a set of data to make it smooth and nearly continuous and remove or diminish outlying points.

Concepts.definition: A measure of the probability that a result happened by chance. The lower the p-value, the more likely it is that the result was caused by phenomenon of interest.
The process by which a data set is simplified to reduce irregularities.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Generic value domain for a primitive java datatype that is a Boolean value (true or false).

ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from DRAFT NEW to RETIRED ARCHIVED and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
